data.name: Gretchen: Queen of Crows
data.detailed_description:
Features

  • Explore beautifully twisted and atmospheric hand drawn areas, each with multiple abilities and a wealth of secrets to uncover.

  • Chain together devastating attacks easily with simple controls that favor timing and reflexes over button mashing.

  • Perform nail biting leaps of faith and gravity defying dashes using tight and responsive controls.

  • Overcome a variety of demonic creatures inspired by dark folklore.
data.about_the_game:
Features

  • Explore beautifully twisted and atmospheric hand drawn areas, each with multiple abilities and a wealth of secrets to uncover.

  • Chain together devastating attacks easily with simple controls that favor timing and reflexes over button mashing.

  • Perform nail biting leaps of faith and gravity defying dashes using tight and responsive controls.

  • Overcome a variety of demonic creatures inspired by dark folklore.
data.short_description: With the help of a mysterious crow, Gretchen must enter her own personal hell to save her friend from the clutches of the demon Paimon, and uncover the truth of her past. Explore, learn deadly attacks, and unleash hell on enemies using devastating combos in this dark fantasy metroidvania.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7+
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 260, ATI Radeon 4870 HD, or equivalent card with at least 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
